title: Fragment of Stela with Figures Holding Lotuses
description: Fragment of a limestone stela, with 2 full registers. The upper with 4 standing figures facing left (a man followed by 3 women), each holding a lotus. The lower with 3 similar figures (all female). Captions before each of them identify them as 'his son (or daughter)...' Remains of polychromy on figures.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
